# right derecia 𓂞 dar ذِرَاع ḏirāʿ dharm 𒆕 DU do! arm

ⲣⲉϥϭⲓ- right-
ⲣⲉϥϭ- rider
ⲣⲉϥϫⲉ- Rede

ⲁⲧϭⲓⲥⲃⲱ untaught anti-
ⲣⲉϥϭⲓⲥⲃⲱ taught ( ⲥⲃⲱ sophie )

𒈩𒌅 rit-tu •right hand
𒈩𒋾 ʷrit-ti wrist

𐀨 ra ⋍ 𓂋𓂝𓂞 ⇔ right

𓐤 𓂋 𓏤 𓇋 𓏏 𓇋 | judge | √right
𓐣 𓂝 𓏛 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓏛 | judge | ⇔ do-right, writ

ambivalent right diRections!

𓇔 𓂋𓇓 R·SU #rsw ⲣⲏⲥ raš 𓁶 𓏤 𓇔 | the South | 𓁶 vs rück vs front 𓏅 𓈖 𓏏 𓈅 𓏤 "south" direction!

𓇋 𓏠 𓈖 𓊿 | right(hand)| 𐩺𐩣𐩬 ymn የማን yäman يَمِين yamīn يمين yimīn Proto-Afroasiatic *yamin-
𓇋 𓏠 𓈖 𓊿 | right(hand)| 𐎊𐎎𐎐 ymn 𒍠 imnum יַמִּינָא yammīnā ܝܡܝܢܐ yammīnā יָמִין yāmîn
𓇋 𓏠 𓈖 𓊿 | West | yamiyn@HEB! יָם yam 𐎊𐎎 ym ܝܡܐ yammāʾ Yemen (West of Mesopotamia, Susa, Elam … )
Yemen (right of Arabia when facing the sunrise) Benjamin <> Amun

𓄛 ⋍ 𐁇 in 𐀇𐁇𐀨 di-pte-ra /diptera/ διφθέρᾱ

𒀀𒋆𒌅 a-rik-tu <<
𒀀𒋆𒌅 (yoke-)shaft, a kind of spear, length

𒄭𒀀𒌅 ḫi-a-ṭu √critique ⇔ right 𒄭
𒄭𒀀𒌅 check, to supervise, weigh (out)

𓎟 𓏏 Alice Alitha Ελευθία 𐀁𐀩𐀄𐀴𐀊 ᵍe-re-u-ti-ja Gelivertya "Liberty" goddess’s name (= ‘the Deliverer’)
